sentences.sContent: We could just see the outline of the house through the mist.
sentences.sCn: 薄雾中我们只能看到房子的轮廓。

sentences.sContent: The hills were shrouded in mist (= covered in mist, so that you could not see them ) .
The mist came down off the mountains.
The mists rolled in off the sea (= came on to the land from the sea ) .

synos.tran: [气象]薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物

remMethod.val: 思念(miss)的泪水令她的双眼蒙上了一层薄雾(mist)

words.tran: 雾浓地；朦胧地，不清楚地

trans.tranOther: a light cloud low over the ground that makes it difficult for you to see very far
